facet_1.name: Glacial Guard
facet_1.effects: Increases Crystal Nova radius and grants allied heroes in the area of effect a physical barrier. Crystal Maiden receives a stronger barrier. +100 Radius

facet_2.name: Arcane Overflow
facet_2.effects: Arcane Aura can be activated to temporarily grant Crystal Maiden spell amplification, while increasing her mana costs and restoring both herself and nearby allied heroes' mana whenever she casts a spell.

effects: Grants the Stop Freezing Field ability
She can now move, albeit slower, cast other abilities and attack during Freezing Field
Increases both the frequency and the number of icy explosions
Applies Frostbite to enemy units that has been standing in the Freezing Field for over a certain duration
Creates a Crystal Clone of Rylai in her place while sliding to the area-targeted direction and disjointing incoming projectiles
If the Crystal Clone takes enough damage or times out, it shatters, and applies Frostbite of its corresponding level to enemies within the radius

abilities.name: Blueheart Floe
abilities.description: Grants the Maiden incoming mana regeneration amplification.
abilities.details: This ability levels up with Freezing Field. Affects all self-mana regeneration sources.

ability_1.name: Crystal Nova
ability_1.details: A burst of damaging frost slows enemy movement speed and attack speed in the targeted area.
ability_1.description: The air temperature around Rylai drops rapidly, chilling all around her to the core.
technical_details: Grants a 6-second 900-radius flying vision centered around the area-targeted location upon cast
Reapplying the debuff refreshes the duration, but neither updates the movement speed nor the attack speed slow values
interaction_notes: The Crystal Clone is vulnerable to all Crystal Nova sources

ability_2.name: Frostbite
ability_2.details: Encases an enemy unit in ice, prohibiting movement and attack, while dealing damage over time.
ability_2.description: Rylai channels winds from the Blueheart Glacier, imprisoning attackers in thick blocks of ice.
technical_details: All ability effects are applied immediately despite the visual effects, and cannot be disjointed
Applies Root, Disarm, and True Sight over the affected target
Deals 25 magical spell damage to the affected enemy unit 0.25-second intervals over the entire duration
All of Frostbite's ability effects are more effective on creeps with a 4x damage factor
interaction_notes: The True Sight component affects debuff immune units

ability_3.name: Arcane Aura
ability_3.details: Grants additional mana regeneration to allied units on the map. Grants a greater bonus to allied units closer to the Maiden.
ability_3.description: Cold temperatures promote the essence of magic, causing Rylai's presence to allow spell usage in abundance.
technical_details: Grants Global aura and proximity aura with 1200 radius
Base mana regen bonus: 0.4/0.6/0.8/1 with 3x proximity bonus factor
The duration of Arcane Overflow is paused during Freezing Field
Arcane Overflow cannot be cast during Freezing Field upgraded with Aghanim's Scepter

ability_4.name: Crystal Clone
ability_4.details: Creates a Crystal Clone of Rylai in her place while sliding to the area-targeted direction and disjointing incoming projectiles.
ability_4.description: So convincing that some allies have spent minutes talking to the clone before they realized she wasn't speaking back.
technical_details: Acquiring Aghanim's Shard unlocks this ability
Does not interrupt Rylai's channeling abilities upon cast
Grants Disjoint incoming projectiles
The created illusion is uncontrollable and untargetable
Damage threshold: 150, Duration: 5 seconds
interaction_notes: If the Crystal Clone takes enough damage or times out, it shatters, and applies Frostbite of its corresponding level to enemies within the radius

ability_5.name: Freezing Field
ability_5.details: Surrounds Crystal Maiden with random icy explosions that slow enemies and deal massive damage.
ability_5.description: Once the place of her exile, Icewrack has become an anchor for Rylai's frigid onslaught.
technical_details: Max Channel Time: 10 seconds
Explosion Spawn Interval: 0.1 seconds
Damage per Explosion: 105/170/250
Move Speed Slow: 40%, Attack Speed Slow: 80/120/160
With Scepter: Explosion Spawn Factor 1.2x, removes channeling restriction
interaction_notes: The Crystal Clone is vulnerable to all Freezing Field sources
Both the movement speed slow and attack speed slow component applied within the radius are independent of the icy explosions

changes: Arcane Aura Arcane Overflow: No longer interrupts movement orders
Reduced allied ability cast mana replenishement factor from 0.25 to 0.15
Now self-mana restores for 0.15 * AlliedAbilityCast ManaCost per proc while active
Blueheart Floe: REMOVED the Cold Comfort facet
Rescaled self-mana regeneration amplification from 50% on each level to 25%/50%/75%/100%
This component levels up with Freezing Field
Crystal Nova: Reduced slow duration from 5 to 4
Arcane Aura: ADDED new Arcane Overflow facet
REMOVED the Freezing Field Frozen Expanse facet
Talents: LVL 10 +100 Crystal Nova radius â†’ +12 intelligence
Talents: LVL 15 -4s Crystal Nova cooldown increased to -4.5s
